Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I believe it aligns well with your budget and will significantly enhance your operations or personal use. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
